CustomField.description: Used by business to show how long the backlog item will live. If an item is a lot of work and the lifespan is only three months, what is the value.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the expected lifespan of the delivered item (Permanent, 1-3 Months, Just until feature X is released, etcâ€¦)
CustomField.label: Lifespan
